description:
It`s the second semester and it`s almost time for the school festival, "Hakuhou Festival". Yuuto`s class activity representatives are Shiina and Yuuto, and their class decides to host a Cosplay Cafe. Haruka is a little jealous because Yuuto is always with Shiina, working on the festival. It`s then that Haruka is asked for advice on how to make a cosplay costume by Yuuto. Yuuto learns from Haruka about a cosplay specialty shop in Akiba, and asks her if she`d come with him on the upcoming Sunday. Haruka, of course delighted by Yuuto`s invitation, did not see any reason to refuse. However, she had already made other plans for that day and...
Source: crunchyroll
